# ExecQueue

Allows executing asynchronous tasks synchronously.

```typescript
class ExecQueue
```

## Methods

| Method                                | Description                                               |
| ------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------- |
| [enqueue](./ExecQueue.enqueue_1.md)   | Pushes an asynchronous task in the exec queue.            |
| [makeSync](./ExecQueue.makeSync_1.md) | Makes a function synchronous by enqueuing its executions. |
